contentrichtext.text: {{refimprove|date=April 2010}} {{Notability|Companies|date=January 2011}} '''Undergroove Records''' was founded as a [[United Kingdom|British]] underground [[heavy metal music|metal]] [[record label]] in [[1998 in music|1998]] by Darren Sadler.
